attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I WOULD LIKE THE PM TO SUPPORT BRITISH BUSINESS AND CAP FUEL PRICES AT NO MORE THAT £0.95 PER LTR.THIS WILL DO MORE GOOD FOR THE PEOPLE IN THE UK THAN ANY INTEREST RATE CUTS

rejection.details:
The main sentence must be a call to action for HM Government not a name.  There is already a petition with this aim:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Fuel-increase/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
